name: part_004
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame speaks to the audience, celebrating her 4th anniversary and interacting with a Poyoyo mascot.
Transition scene with a background of bamboo and a torii gate at night.
Performance of the song 'Zankyou Sanka' by Nakiri Ayame and Ookami Mio.
Ayame and Mio talk about the performance and Ayame's special yukata outfit.

subtitles.original: あの、日頃の感謝を込めまして、
subtitles.english: So, to express my daily gratitude,

subtitles.original: えー、歌って踊っていきたいと思いますので、
subtitles.english: I'd like to sing and dance for you today.

subtitles.original: 皆さんTwitterかなんかで、あのハッシュタグ #百鬼あやめ4周年記念 で呟いて行ってください。
subtitles.english: Everyone, please tweet on Twitter or something with the hashtag #NakiriAyame4thAnniversary.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、スクショも撮ってって下さいね、
subtitles.english: Everyone, please take some screenshots too!

subtitles.original: ね、みんな、みんな撮ってね！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Okay? Everyone, take some! Yay!

subtitles.original: ということで、これからまたゲストの方もなんかね、登場してくるんですけど…
subtitles.english: So, some more guests are going to appear now, but...

subtitles.original: お？お？お？あれ？
subtitles.english: Oh? Oh? Oh? What's that?

subtitles.original: はっ！なんかぽよよが！えっ！
subtitles.english: Hah! There's a Poyoyo! What!

subtitles.original: 可愛いの、こっちおいで、おいで。
subtitles.english: So cute! Come here, come here.

subtitles.original: え、可愛よ、え、見て、ちょっと、しょ。
subtitles.english: Wait, so cute! Wait, look, just a sec, oof.

subtitles.original: 見てください、このぽよよ、これ持てるんですよ、
subtitles.english: Look at this Poyoyo, I can carry it!

subtitles.original: 可愛よでしょう、見て、
subtitles.english: Isn't it cute? Look!

subtitles.original: ぽよぽよぽよ、ぽよぽよ。
subtitles.english: Poyo-poyo-poyo, poyo-poyo.

subtitles.original: ということで、この後もね、まだゲストもたくさん来ますので、
subtitles.english: So, more guests will be coming after this,

subtitles.original: 皆さん最後も、最後も、なんか嬉しいお知らせがあるかも？ないかも？
subtitles.english: and at the end, there might be some happy news? Or maybe not?

subtitles.original: ということで、これからも見ててください、
subtitles.english: So, please keep watching,

subtitles.original: これからも見て、えーと、見ていってください！
subtitles.english: keep watching, and... keep watching!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！またね！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! See ya!

subtitles.original: 残響散歌
subtitles.english: Zankyou Sanka

subtitles.original: 作詞: aimerrhythm 作曲: 飛内将大
subtitles.english: Lyrics: aimerrhythm, Composition: Masahiro Tobai

subtitles.original: 誰が袖に咲く幻花
subtitles.english: Whose sleeve will the phantom flower bloom upon?

subtitles.original: ただそこに藍を落とした
subtitles.english: Simply dropping the indigo there.

subtitles.original: 派手に色を溶かす夜に銀朱の月を添えて
subtitles.english: Adding a vermilion moon to the night where colors melt flamboyantly.

subtitles.original: 転がるように風を切って
subtitles.english: Cutting through the wind as if rolling.

subtitles.original: つまずくごとに強くなった
subtitles.english: Becoming stronger every time I stumble.

subtitles.original: 光も痛みも怒りも全部抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing all the light, pain, and anger.

subtitles.original: 選ばれなければ 選べばいい
subtitles.english: If I'm not chosen, I'll just choose for myself.

subtitles.original: 声を轟かせ 夜のその向こうへ
subtitles.english: Letting my voice roar toward the other side of the night.

subtitles.original: 涙で滲んでいた あんなに遠くの景色まで
subtitles.english: Until reaching that distant scenery blurred by tears.

subtitles.original: 響き渡れ
subtitles.english: Resonate far and wide.

subtitles.original: 何を奏でて 誰に届けたくて
subtitles.english: What do I play, and who do I want to reach?

subtitles.original: 不確かなままがいい どんなに暗い感情も
subtitles.english: It's better to remain uncertain, no matter how dark the emotions,

subtitles.original: どんなに長い葛藤も
subtitles.english: or how long the inner conflict.

subtitles.original: 歌と散れ 残響
subtitles.english: Scatter with the song, resonance.

subtitles.original: ただ一人舞う千夜
subtitles.english: Dancing through a thousand nights alone.

subtitles.original: 違えない帯を結べば
subtitles.english: Tying the sash correctly.

subtitles.original: 派手な色も燃やすように朱色の香草あれ
subtitles.english: May there be vermilion herbs as if to burn even flamboyant colors.

subtitles.original: この先どんな辛い時も
subtitles.english: No matter how hard the times ahead may be,

subtitles.original: 口先よりも胸を張って
subtitles.english: rather than just talk, I'll puff out my chest,

subtitles.original: 抱いた夢の灯りを全部辿るだけ
subtitles.english: and simply follow all the lights of the dreams I held.

subtitles.original: 逃げ出すため ここまで来たんじゃないだろう
subtitles.english: I didn't come this far just to run away, did I?

subtitles.original: 声を枯らして 燃える花のように
subtitles.english: Singing until my voice is gone, like a burning flower.

subtitles.original: 闇間を照らして
subtitles.english: Illuminating the darkness.

subtitles.original: 曖昧すぎる世界も 譜面にして
subtitles.english: Even this world that's all too vague, turning it into a score.

subtitles.original: 夜を数えて 朝を描くような
subtitles.english: Counting the nights and painting the morning,

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな音色鳴らせ
subtitles.english: let the vivid tones ring out.

subtitles.original: どんなに深い後悔も
subtitles.english: No matter how deep the regrets,

subtitles.original: どんなに高い限界も
subtitles.english: or how high the limits,

subtitles.original: 掻き消して 残響
subtitles.english: Drown them all out, resonance.

subtitles.original: はああ〜！
subtitles.english: Haaa~!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったなぁ。
subtitles.english: That was fun.

subtitles.original: 楽しかった。
subtitles.english: It was fun.

subtitles.original: あやめ、4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Ayame, congratulations on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！やったー！4周年だ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Yay! It's my 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: 4周年、4周年。
subtitles.english: 4th anniversary, 4th anniversary.

subtitles.original: あやめなんか今日、浴衣可愛いね。
subtitles.english: Ayame, your yukata is cute today.

subtitles.original: そうなの、気づいてくれた？
subtitles.english: Yeah, you noticed?

subtitles.original: あのね、ホロライブサマーとはちょっと違った色の浴衣なんですよ。
subtitles.english: You see, it's a slightly different color from the Hololive Summer yukata.

subtitles.original: なんかお花の色がいい感じにあやめの髪の毛の色とマッチしてるね。
subtitles.english: The flower colors match your hair color really well.

subtitles.original: えへへ、赤と緑の浴衣にしてみました。
subtitles.english: Ehehe, I went with a red and green yukata.

subtitles.original: なかなか緑系はね、あやめは選ばないから…
subtitles.english: Ayame doesn't usually pick green...
